snippet: The way Matteo Renzi plays his hand will affect the way the European Central Bank and the rest of the European Union play their cards.
lead_paragraph: The way Matteo Renzi plays his hand will affect the way the European Central Bank and the rest of the European Union play their cards.

headline.main: Europe's Future Hinges on Italy's Success
headline.print_headline: Europe's Future Hinges on Italy's Success
